name: Dragon Master
description:
Legends say Alradur was once a land where man and dragon coexisted in peace. Prophecy states that a boy and a dragon will eventually meet to reinstate this past harmony along with reviving the Tree of Life and restoring the order of the Dragon Masters.

Players take on the role of of a young boy named Ben. Ben lives in Alradur with his parents and his sister Lana. After Ben takes a trip into a field, an earthquake happens and Ben is split from his family and then winds up inside a cave where he meets the mysterious Aviel. Aviel introduces Ben to the art of magic and explains to him his future role.

Players move Ben by tapping the stylus to the spot they want him to go to or to the object they want him to interact with. Ben has a magical staff and a book of five spells with which he will have to use to dispatch enemies and solve puzzles. Spells are cast by drawing the magic symbol with the stylus. Ben will also have the opportunity to fly on the back of a dragon.
